results.content: I think the course will be good, and so far, I really like the instructor. What I don't like is that the playback is skippy. The instructor was speaking, and then it seemed like it froze, so I went back 10 sec, froze in the same place, then I went forward 10 sec, and it started again. Meanwhile, a lot of things can happen in 10 seconds.

response.content: Skippy videos are definitely connected to server / bandwith problems. Either it is increased interest in Udemy courses during Covid outbreak or it can be also some problem with your internet connection. If this problem still occurs maybe try to contact Udemy support.
response.content_html: Skippy videos are definitely connected to server / bandwith problems. Either it is increased interest in Udemy courses during Covid outbreak or it can be also some problem with your internet connection. If this problem still occurs maybe try to contact Udemy support.
